summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of One Thousand Six Hundred Eighty-six and 82/100 (1,686.92) Dollars, or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the Water Fund of the City of Seattle, to pay the City's portion of the cost of constructing water mains, for the improvement of Fourth Avenue, et al, by paving, sidewalking, and laying water mains, as provided for by Ordinance No. 18473, creating Local Improvement District No. 1741.
